dcterms:creator: S. Mahadevan
M. Maggioni
dcterms:description: A two-room environment consisting of 100 states, with 57 accessible states and 43 inaccessible states representing walls. The goal state is marked in red, and the agent receives a reward of +100 for reaching it.
dcterms:title: Two-room environment

dcterms:creator: S. Mahadevan
M. Maggioni
dcterms:description: An obstacles-room environment with 100 states, some of which are inaccessible due to walls. The agent can access 14 states with a fixed probability of 0.2, while the others are reachable with a probability of 0.9. The goal state is located at the upper-right corner, and the agent receives a reward of +100 for reaching it.
dcterms:title: Obstacles-room environment

dcterms:creator: P. Montague
dcterms:description: A maze environment used to illustrate the concept of reinforcement learning, featuring walls and a goal room.
dcterms:title: Maze environment (Figure 1)

dcterms:creator: A. Grover
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: Graphs used for various node embedding methods including node2vec, struc2vec, VGAE, and GraphWave.
dcterms:title: Graphs for node embedding methods (node2vec, struc2vec, VGAE, GraphWave)

dcterms:creator: M. Lagoudakis
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sample transitions used for least-squares policy iteration in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Sample transitions dataset D
